title: Titration curve - indicator changes past equiv pt.

content.prompt: A student carries out the same titration but uses an indicator instead of a pH meter. If the indicator changes color slightly past the equivalence point, what will the student obtain for the calculated concentration of the acid?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
